attributes.action: To start a fund raising campaign for the Victims of flooding in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The victims of the terrible floods in the last few weeks have  been left with nothing.  Those who were not insured do not even have the prospect of being able to replace the contents of their homes that have been lost.  If we can raise vast sums of money for people all over the world who suffer from natural disasters or so called acts of God, why can't we help our own people in the same way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
